Goodbye_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I'd love to go learn from the wordsmiths
at the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover Gazette<clr:ffff> when Hebra's
<clr:0000>big cold snap<clr:ffff> passes.
Goodbye_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_01>Strange to think that I can just sit right
here and get an eye on the affairs of the
whole world...
Goodbye_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>I've always wondered how this reading
material called a "newspaper" is made...
And who makes it, exactly?
<sp:3:0:2:0101>The <clr:0000>big cold snap<clr:ffff> is over, so maybe I'll go
visit the news hounds at the <clr:0000>Lucky Clover
Gazette<clr:ffff> and see what I can learn.
Goodbye_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS>Those magnificent geniuses at the <clr:0000>Lucky
Clover Gazette<clr:ffff>... They cram a world of
information on to such thin paper.
